data.eml:eml: New species of Nesocricos and Tanycricos (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Naucoridae: Cheirochelinae: Tanycricini) in the mountains of West Papua, Indonesian New Guinea

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sites, Robert W. (2008): New species of Nesocricos and Tanycricos (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Naucoridae: Cheirochelinae: Tanycricini) in the mountains of West Papua, Indonesian New Guinea. Zootaxa 1714: 19-30, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.180979
